TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PropertyDescriptor extends System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor
Public MustInherit Class PropertyDescriptor Inherits MemberDescriptor
public ref class PropertyDescriptor abstract : System::ComponentModel::MemberDescriptor

summary.span: 提供类的属性的抽象。

span.span: Provides an abstraction of a property on a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的说明包含名称、 其属性、 属性所关联的组件类和属性的类型。A description of a property consists of a name, its attributes, the component class that the property is associated with, and the type of the property. 提供了以下属性和方法： provides the following properties and methods: - 包含此属性。 contains the for this property. - 指示是否应本地化此属性。 indicates whether this property should be localized. - 返回指定类型的编辑器。 returns an editor of the specified type. 此外提供了以下`abstract`属性和方法： also provides the following `abstract` properties and methods: - 包含此属性绑定到组件的类型。 contains the type of component this property is bound to. - 指示此属性是只读的。 indicates whether this property is read-only. - 获取属性的类型。 gets the type of the property. - 指示是否会重置组件更改组件的值。 indicates whether resetting the component changes the value of the component. - 在组件上返回的属性的当前值。 returns the current value of the property on a component. - 重置组件的此属性的值。 resets the value for this property of the component. - 组件的值设置为不同的值。 sets the value of the component to a different value. - 指示是否需要保留此属性的值。 indicates whether the value of this property needs to be persisted. 通常情况下，`abstract`成员通过反射实现。Typically, the `abstract` members are implemented through reflection. 有关反射的详细信息，请参阅中的主题[反射](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md)。For more information about reflection, see the topics in [Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例根据中的示例生成类。The following code example is built upon the example in the class. 它打印在文本框中按钮的文本的信息 （类别、 说明、 显示名称）。It prints the information (category, description, display name) of the text of a button in a text box. 它假定`button1`和`textbox1`已实例化窗体上。It assumes that `button1` and `textbox1` have been instantiated on a form. [!code-cpp[PropertyDescriptor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PropertyDescriptor/CPP/propertydescriptor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PropertyDescriptor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PropertyDescriptor/CS/propertydescriptor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PropertyDescriptor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PropertyDescriptor/VB/propertydescriptor.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何实现提供了一个属性的只读包装的自定义属性描述符。The following code example shows how to implement a custom property descriptor that provides a read-only wrapper around a property. `SerializeReadOnlyPropertyDescriptor`使用自定义设计器为控件的提供只读的属性描述符属性。The `SerializeReadOnlyPropertyDescriptor` is used in a custom designer to provide a read-only property descriptor for the control's property. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor/CS/SerializeReadOnlyPropertyDescriptor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor/VB/SerializeReadOnlyPropertyDescriptor.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`SerializeReadOnlyPropertyDescriptor`自定义设计器中。The following code examples show how to use the `SerializeReadOnlyPropertyDescriptor` in a custom designer. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor/CS/DemoControlDesigner.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor/VB/DemoControlDesigner.vb#10)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor/CS/DemoControl.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor/VB/DemoControl.vb#100)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，此方法实现通过反射。Typically, this method is implemented through reflection.

span.para: 当在派生类中重写此方法查找。如果找到，它将与该属性的当前值的属性的值进行比较。它将返回时，默认值与属性的当前值不匹配。如果此方法找不到，它会查找您需要实现自己的找不方法。如果找到了此，则返回"找不返回。否则，它会查找您需要实现自己的找不方法。如果找到了此返回。如果找不到，找不方法，或找不方法，然后它将返回。

When overridden in a derived class, this method looks for a . If it finds one, it compares the value of the attribute with the property's current value. It returns when the default value does not match the property's current value. If this method cannot find a , it looks for a "ShouldPersistMyProperty" method that you need to implement yourself. If this is found, returns what "ShouldPersistMyProperty" returns. Otherwise, it looks for a "ResetMyProperty" method that you need to implement yourself. If this is found, returns . If it cannot find a , a "ShouldPersistMyProperty" method, or a "ResetMyProperty" method, then it returns .

A collection of property descriptor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将传递`null`同时`instance`参数和`filter`参数。This method passes `null` for both the `instance` parameter and the `filter` parameter. 属性`instance`参数可以不同于类的属性，因为容器可以添加或删除属性，如果`instance`确定位置参数。The properties for the `instance` parameter can differ from the properties of a class, because the container can add or remove properties if the `instance` parameter is sited. `filter`参数可以混合和对象。The `filter` parameter can mix and objects. 筛选由以下规则定义：Filtering is defined by the following rules: - 一个对象被视为通配符; 它匹配任何属性具有的属性集中。A object is treated as a wildcard; it matches any property that has the in its set of attributes. - 如果属性不具有的同一个类，该属性不会包含在返回的数组。If a property does not have an of the same class, the property will not be included in the returned array. - 如果属性是实例，该属性必须是完全匹配要包含在返回的数组中。If the attribute is an instance of , the property must be an exact match to be included in the returned array. - 如果指定和它是默认属性时，将包含在返回的数组，即使不没有的任何实例属性中。If you specify an and it is the default property, it will be included in the returned array, even if there is no instance of in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将传递`null`为`instance`参数。This method passes `null` for the `instance` parameter. 属性`instance`参数可以不同于类的属性，因为该站点可以添加或删除属性，如果`instance`确定位置参数。The properties for the `instance` parameter can differ from the properties of a class, because the site can add or remove properties if the `instance` parameter is sited. `filter`参数可以混合和对象。The `filter` parameter can mix and objects. 筛选由以下规则定义：Filtering is defined by the following rules: - 一个对象被视为通配符; 它匹配任何属性具有的属性集中。A object is treated as a wildcard; it matches any property that has the in its set of attributes. - 如果属性不具有的同一个类，该属性不会包含在返回的数组。If a property does not have an of the same class, the property will not be included in the returned array. - 如果属性是实例，该属性必须是完全匹配要包含在返回的数组中。If the attribute is an instance of , the property must be an exact match to be included in the returned array. - 如果指定实例，并且它是默认属性时，将包含返回的数组中即使存在的任何实例属性中。If you specify an instance and it is the default property, it will be included in the returned array even if there is no instance of the in the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResetValue(object component) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub ResetValue (component As Object)

param.name: component
param.span: 具有要重置为默认值的属性值的组件。

span.span: The component with the property value that is to be reset to the default value.

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，将组件的此属性的值重置为默认值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, resets the value for this property of the component to the default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，此方法实现通过反射。Typically, this method is implemented through reflection. 此方法确定要重置为按以下优先级顺序中的属性的值：This method determines the value to reset the property to in the following order of precedence: 1. 没有此属性的隐藏的属性。There is a shadowed property for this property. 2. 没有此属性。There is a for this property. 3. 没有已实现，其中"MyProperty"是将传递给它的属性名称"找不"方法。There is a "ResetMyProperty" method that you have implemented, where "MyProperty" is the name of the property you pass to it. 此方法创建自动按以下顺序：This method creates a automatically in the following order: 1. 方法调用方法来创建一个新来表示所做的更改。The method calls the method to create a new to represent the changes. 2. 方法调用方法，以指示在事务开始和即将发生的更改。The method calls the method to indicate that the transaction has begun and the changes are about to occur. 3. 该方法将属性重置为此方法检查顺序确定的值。The method resets the property to the value determined by this method's checking order. 4. 方法调用方法，以指示已发生更改。The method calls the method to indicate that the changes have occurred. 5. 方法调用以指示完成该事务。The method calls to indicate that the transaction is completed. 事务的目的是支持`Undo`和`Redo`功能。The purpose of the transaction is to support `Undo` and `Redo` functionality.

span.para: 当在派生类中重写此方法查找。如果找到，则将设置到的属性的值找到它。如果此方法找不到，它会查找您需要实现一个找不方法。如果找到了此方法对其进行调用。如果找不到或找不方法的实现，它不执行操作。

When overridden in a derived class, this method looks for a . If it finds one, it sets the value of the property to the it found. If this method cannot find a , it looks for a "ResetMyProperty" method that you need to implement. If this is found, the method invokes it. If cannot find a or a "ResetMyProperty" method that you implemented, it does not perform an operation.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, sets the value of the component to a different value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，此方法实现通过反射。Typically, this method is implemented through reflection. 此方法创建自动按以下顺序：This method creates a automatically in the following order: 1. 方法调用方法来创建一个新来表示所做的更改。The method calls the method to create a new to represent the changes. 2. 方法调用方法，以指示在事务开始和即将发生的更改。The method calls the method to indicate that the transaction has begun and the changes are about to occur. 3. 该方法将属性重置为此方法检查顺序确定的值。The method resets the property to the value determined by this method's checking order. 4. 方法调用方法，以指示已发生更改。The method calls the method to indicate that the changes have occurred. 5. 方法调用来指示该事务已完成。The method calls to indicate that the transaction is complete. 事务的目的是支持`Undo`和`Redo`功能。The purpose of the transaction is to support `Undo` and `Redo` functionality.

span.para: 当你重写此方法时，它应通过调用适当的"SetMyProperty"方法，您需要实现设置属性的值。如果指定的值不是有效的该组件应引发异常，从而向上传递。您应设计属性，以便"GetMyProperty"方法 （即已实现） 以下"SetMyProperty"方法返回"SetMyProperty"方法不会引发异常时所传递的值。

When you override this method, it should set the value of the property by invoking the appropriate "SetMyProperty" method that you need to implement. If the value specified is not valid, the component should throw an exception, which is passed up. You should design the property so that a "GetMyProperty" method (that you have implemented) following a "SetMyProperty" method returns the value passed in when the "SetMyProperty" method does not throw an exception.

Public MustOverride Function ShouldSerializeValue (component As Object) As Boolean

param.name: component
param.span: 具有要检查其持久性的属性的组件。

span.span: The component with the property to be examined for persistence.

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，确定一个值，该值指示是否需要永久保存此属性的值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, determines a value indicating whether the value of this property needs to be persisted.

returns.span: 如果属性应该被永久保存，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the property should be persisted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，此方法实现通过反射。Typically, this method is implemented through reflection.

span.para:
当在派生类中重写此方法会返回如果该属性的当前值不同于其默认值。它会查找默认值通过第一个查找。如果此方法找到此属性，它将与该属性的当前值的属性的值进行比较。如果此方法找不到，它会查找您需要实现一个找不方法。如果找到，对其进行调用。如果找不到此方法或"找不"方法，它不能创建优化并返回。
类实现继承的组件的特殊的序列化逻辑。有关详细信息，请参阅。

When overridden in a derived class, this method returns if the current value of the property is different from its default value. It looks for a default value by first looking for a . If the method finds this attribute, it compares the value of the attribute with the property's current value. If this method cannot find a , it looks for a "ShouldSerializeMyProperty" method that you need to implement. If it is found, invokes it. If this method cannot find a or a "ShouldSerializeMyProperty" method, it cannot create optimizations and it returns .
The class implements special serialization logic for inherited components. For more information, see .

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示此属性的值更改通知是否源自属性说明符的外部。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether value change notifications for this property may originate from outside the property descriptor.

value.span: 如果值更改通知可能源自属性说明符的外部，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if value change notifications may originate from outside the property descriptor; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否为此属性的值更改通知可以源自属性说明符的外部例如源自组件本身，或是否通知只源自对进行直接调用方法。The property indicates whether value change notifications for this property may originate from outside the property descriptor, such as from the component itself, or whether notifications will only originate from direct calls made to the method. 例如，该组件可能会实现接口，或者可能具有显式`name.Changed`此属性的事件。For example, the component may implement the interface, or may have an explicit `name.Changed` event for this property.
